content: The case is simple. The ship is presently arrested or restrained or detained by the Egyptian Suez Canal Authority and will only be released against a payment of $1 billion. As the owner does not have that money, I recommend that the owner abandons the ship and declares a Constructive Total Loss for H&M underwriters to pay.

author: Total
content:
“Why hasnt Egypt bothered to make a second canal”

Egypt is in the process of digging a second canal. The Ever Given was in the part that hadn’t been doubled yet.

author: Rob Buchanan
content: When do we start asking the same questions about ultra-large ships and New York Harbor? We seem determined to accommodate these vessels and embark on another round of harbor deepening without any real understanding of the economic consequences, let alone the environmental ones.
